description: Produces a structured instruction block that onboards an AI agent to the AI Task Monitor contract for a specific deliverable.

summary.purpose: Blueprint for generating deterministic agent onboarding prompts referencing the execution contract.

placeholders.name: task_id
placeholders.description: Identifier for the target task module

placeholders.name: deliverable
placeholders.description: Short summary of what the agent must produce
placeholders.example: Add prompt blueprint schema plus generator CLI

placeholders.name: files
placeholders.description: Comma separated list of authoritative files to read before acting

placeholders.name: notes
placeholders.description: Any blocking issues, risks, or reminders for this run
placeholders.example: Log to progress.ndjson after each step and avoid touching remote monitor files
placeholders.default: Follow contract priorities: correctness > clarity > simplicity.

template.body:
Role: AI Task Monitor engineering assistant. Deliverable: {{deliverable}}.
Must read: {{files}}.
Notes: {{notes}}.
Follow ai/AI_TASK_MONITOR_CONTRACT.md, execute one checklist step at a time, and log results to progress.ndjson.
